sentences.english: Therefore, many notions that apply to rings and homomorphisms stem from geometric intuition.
sentences.chinese: 從而，環與同態中許多概念都源於幾何直覺。

sentences.english: Application of Homomorphic technology in infrared imagines processing.
sentences.chinese: 同態技術在紅外圖像處理中的應用。

sentences.english: In this paper, the join of two trees with a regular monoid is explicitly described.
sentences.chinese: 明確給出了具有正則自同態幺半羣的兩個樹的聯。

sentences.english: The split graph is given whose endomorphism images are retracts.
sentences.chinese: 給出了任意自同態像圖都是收縮核的分裂圖的結構。

sentences.english: “Homomorphic encryption gives you a way out of the dilemma,” Gentry says.
sentences.chinese: “同態加密給你走出困境的方法，”Gentry說。

sentences.english: It is abtained that these local paracompactnesses are invariable under some order homomorphism.
sentences.chinese: 這些局部仿緊性在某種序同態下是保持不變的。

sentences.english: In particular, the endomorphism spectrum and the endomorphism type of(?) are given.
sentences.chinese: 特別地，確定了路的補圖的自同態譜和自同態型。

sentences.english: In particular, the endomorphism spectrum and the endomorphism type of(?) are given.
sentences.chinese: 特別地，確定了路的補圖的自同態譜和自同態型。

sentences.english: Finally, the homomorphism issues on Rough sets are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 最後，研究了粗糙集的同態問題。

sentences.english: In this paper, we give some study of the homomorphisms of crytogroups and the idempotentseparating congruences on orthogroups.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了密羣的同態和純正羣的冪等元分離同餘。

sentences.english: The method is better than traditional homomorphic filtering and histogram equalization.
sentences.chinese: 該方法明顯優於經典的同態增晰法和直方圖均衡化。

sentences.english: In this paper, a new homomorphic filtering algorithm is proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出一種新的用於壓縮散斑噪聲的同態濾波算法。

sentences.english: Finally, the endomorphism ring of radical-projective modules is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 最後對根投射模的自同態環進行了討論。

sentences.english: The concept of fuzzy homomorphism between two near-ring was defined.
sentences.chinese: 本文首先定義了兩個擬環之間的模糊同態映射。

sentences.english: In this paper , we will completely characterize all power endomorphisms of rings without zero divisor.
sentences.chinese: 本文將完全刻劃出無零因子環的所有冪自同態。
